overview:
Christopher Ross creates new and interactive ways to merge business and community.
Raised by his Grandparents who were active community memberâ€™s volunteering at their local Church, Mended Hearts, Meals on Wheels and various other community events. Professionally he cut his teeth in the auto industry and then established himself as finance professional over the last decade. Being from two of the hardest hit industries, he decided not to feed into the negativity surrounding him but found the good. After Meeting with schools and nonprofits soon he was inspired by their optimism. Spending a few years figuring out how to combine business and community, he could not be prouder of DonateBin. In his spare time he follows the Chargers, Padres and The Ohio State University with his trusty cat Saucy.
